alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 24 at 2:41PM CDT until May 25 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...North St. Louis, Central St. Louis and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis
